DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study Gemzar , Taxol & Avastin Combination 1st Line Treatment Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate time-to-progression ( TTP ) patient metastatic breast cancer , receive 1st line therapy bevacizumab combination paclitaxel gemcitabine . Secondary objective include response rate overall survival ( OS ) .
